pr_title: Fix working directory property in quarkusDev task

timeline.message: Fix working directory property in quarkusDev task

timeline.bodyText:
Looks like you got it right! Probably a path issue on windows?
If it's fully working, perhaps, we shouldn't be deprecating the method.
timeline.author: aloubyansky

replies.bodyText:
@aloubyansky you are right, this is a path issue on windows, I updated the code to use java.io.tmpdir instead.
Using the getter to get workingDir instead of accessing it directly fix the issue.
replies.author: glefloch
